text: Brooke Baldwin (born July 12, 1979) is an American journalist and television news anchor. Baldwin has been at CNN since 2008. Baldwin hosts CNN Newsroom. She was born in Atlanta, Georgia. Baldwin hosts CNN's New Year's Eve Live with Anderson Cooper. In 2017, Baldwin was featured in a Variety magazine article "Women Surge to Top of TV News in Face of Sexism". In April 2020, Baldwin was diagnosed with COVID-19, days after CNN journalist Chris Cuomo was diagnosed. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:CNN people Category:American television news anchors Category:Journalists from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Writers from Atlanta
title: Brooke Baldwin
